field.description: Specify the field(s) to be returned by server. You can repeat this option.

format.description: the output format, defaults to table (choices: csv, json, table, value, yaml)

noindent.description: whether to disable indenting the JSON

project_id.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by id

project_name.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by name

sort_dir.description: Sorts the list in the specified direction. You can repeat this option. (choices: asc, desc)

sort_key.description: Sorts the list by the specified fields in the specified directions. You can repeat this option, but you must specify an equal number of sort_dir and sort_key values. Extra sort_dir options are ignored. Missing sort_dir options use the default asc value.
